title: struct assignment not permanent
body:
by **sliverdragon37**: 
Ran hg pull -u. problem persisted

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. compile included file (homework for neural nets class)
2. read where the print statements are, and see what is calling what. accept should set
n.error, and then trial and learn should be able to see the change.
3. run the program and see that the accept function only set n.error locally.

compiler 6g/6l, ubuntu 10.04.

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

revision: fe1efa01dbd5 tip
Attachments: 1. adeline.go (47151 bytes)
